statements: SELECT id, title FROM forums
SELECT description, created_at FROM forums
SELECT num_posts FROM forums WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM forums WHERE num_posts > 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, title, num_posts FROM forums WHERE title LIKE '%database%'
SELECT * FROM forums WHERE id = 'abc123' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, title FROM forums WHERE num_posts > 100 ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT id, description, num_posts FROM forums WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' AND num_posts BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT title, num_posts FROM forums ORDER BY num_posts DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM forums WHERE num_posts < 50
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_id, title, content FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, title, created_at FROM posts WHERE title LIKE '%example%' AND content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 3;
SELECT posts.title, users.username FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN posts ON users.id = posts.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM discussions;
SELECT title, description FROM discussions WHERE discussion_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT post_id, content, created_at FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT discussion_id, COUNT(*) AS post_count FROM posts GROUP BY discussion_id;
SELECT * FROM discussions;
SELECT discussion_id, title FROM discussions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM discussions WHERE discussion_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;

SELECT posts.post_id, discussions.title, users.username FROM posts JOIN discussions ON posts.discussion_id = discussions.discussion_id JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY posts.created_at DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students;
SELECT post_id, post_title FROM Posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT comment_content FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Likes WHERE liked_by = 3;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM Posts WHERE posted_by = 4;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT post_title, post_content, student_name FROM Posts JOIN Students ON Posts.posted_by = Students.student_id;
SELECT post_title, COUNT(comment_id) AS num_comments FROM Posts LEFT JOIN Comments ON Posts.post_id = Comments.post_id GROUP BY post_title;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(like_id) AS num_likes FROM Students LEFT JOIN Likes ON Students.student_id = Likes.liked_by GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY num_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM Posts WHERE post_author_id = 1;
SELECT comment_content, comment_date FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM Posts WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT post_title, post_date FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT comment_content, comment_date FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 1 ORDER BY comment_date ASC
SELECT post_title, category_name FROM Posts JOIN Categories ON Posts.post_id = Categories.category_id
